                        $ wget https://tar.goaccess.io/goaccess-1.5.6.tar.gz
$ tar -xzvf goaccess-1.5.6.tar.gz
$ cd goaccess-1.5.6/
$ ./configure --enable-utf8 --enable-geoip=mmdb
$ make
# make install
